abstract: Verizon Wireless is spearheading an initiative that would bring together a half-dozen venture capital firms and network equipment vendors to help fund development of Long Term Evolution technology, used to offer wireless service over large distances.
snippet: Verizon Wireless is spearheading an initiative that would bring together a half-dozen venture capital firms and network equipment vendors to help fund development of Long Term Evolution technology, used to offer wireless service over large distanc...
lead_paragraph: Verizon Wireless is spearheading an initiative that would bring together a half-dozen venture capital firms and network equipment vendors to help fund development of Long Term Evolution technology, used to offer wireless service over large distances.

abstract: Google now has support for Android on all the major wireless carriers in the United States, except AT&T, the home of the iPhone.
snippet: Google now has support for Android on all the major wireless carriers in the United States, except AT&T, the home of the iPhone.
lead_paragraph: A year after Google introduced its Android operating system on T-Mobile, the smallest of the major wireless carriers in the United States, it announced a deal to offer handsets with Verizon Wireless, the nation’s largest carrier.

abstract: Google and Verizon plan to make Android handsets and other devices that do things on Verizon’s network that Android phones on other networks can’t do.
snippet: Google and Verizon plan to make Android handsets and other devices that do things on Verizon’s network that Android phones on other networks can’t do.
lead_paragraph: Being open doesn’t mean being ordinary, at least in the construction of Lowell C. McAdam, the chief executive of Verizon Wireless.

headline.main: Verizon O.K. With Competition From Android Apps
